DOC.detailed_description: A total consecutive patient CAS registry Cardiovascular Center Korea University Guro Hospital rest chest pain without significant coronary lesion ( luminal narrowing < 50 % ) underwent provocation test Ach infusion coronary angiography November 2004 May 2012 registerd . Among , patient document cardiovascular disease and/or serious medical condition , increase serum creatinine level ( > 2mg/dl ) , exclude . Patients exclude due incomplete data . The study population divide quartile base rise systolic BP , diastolic BP , pulse pressure . Each group define follow criterion : 1 ) group 1 : systolic BP < 117mmHg , diastolic BP < 69mmHg , pulse pressure < 42mmHg ; 2 ) group 2 : systolic BP 117-130 mmHg , diastolic BP 69-77 mmHg , pulse pressure 42-51mmHg ; 3 ) group 3 : systolic BP 131-141 mmHg , diastolic BP 78-86 mmHg , pulse pressure 52-61mmHg ; 4 ) group 4 : systolic BP > 141 mmHg , diastolic BP > 86 mmHg , pulse pressure > 61mmHg . CAS+Chest Pain mean > 70 % luminal narrowing Ach provocation test . and/or concurrent typical chest pain . BP measure noninvasive BP monitoring device patient lie angiographic table five-minute rest ( Patient monitoring system , NP 30 : Philips , Amsterdam , The Netherlands ) . The first reading discard , mean next two consecutive reading use . Next , coronary angiography perform . Hypertension define systolic BP ≥140mmHg and/or diastolic BP ≥90mmHg least two consecutive reading outpatient clinic . Patients take antihypertensive medication also categorize hypertensive . Other Risk factor CAS examine study include hyperlipidemia ( total cholesterol level ≥200mg /dl current medication lipid-lowering drug ) , diabetes ( fast blood glucose≥126mg /dl , and/or glycated Hemoglobin A1c level 6.5 % current use medication ) , current smoker ( active smoking within past 12 month ) , current alcohol user ( least 1 alcohol drinking week ) .
